entry.title: Week 42, 2025: Windows build fixes PR opened addressing Cygwin and MSYS2 compatibility issues
entry.content:
Summary

Windows build compatibility improvements for OCaml 5.0+ on Cygwin and MSYS2 platforms

Activity

  • Windows build fixes PR opened by David Allsopp addressing OCaml 5.0+ compatibility on Cygwin and MSYS2 environments (#112). The PR resolves build failures from path separator mishandling in findlib.conf generation (ocaml/opam#6732), fixes silent findlib.conf misgeneration on mingw-w64/MSVC (ocaml/opam-repository#28636), corrects incorrect META.pkg checking in ocamlfind install, and addresses minor legacy issues with cygpath flags and Standard Library retrieval. The PR shifts findlib.conf generation from build-time to configure-time to simplify path escaping logic
entry.summary: Windows build fixes PR opened addressing Cygwin and MSYS2 compatibility issues
